file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 76-12-01-06 - THRUST LEVER RESOLVER - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL THRUST LEVER RESOLVER - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do a general visual inspection on the resolver attachments to the thrust levers. B. This procedure is applicable to the LH and RH thrust lever (TLA) resolvers. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 76-12-01-200-801-A ♦ RESOLVERS - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 76-12-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 76-12-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. RESOLVERS - INSPECTION A. General (1) To do the inspection on the resolver attachment to the thrust levers, obey these instructions. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 27-63-03-000-801-A/400 SPEED BRAKE COMMAND LEVER - REMOVAL AMM TASK 27-63-03-400-801-A/400 SPEED BRAKE COMMAND LEVER - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 76-11-01-000-801-A/400 CONTROL STAND ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL AMM TASK 76-11-01-400-801-A/400 CONTROL STAND ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 76-11-05-000-801-A/400 CONTROL STAND MASK - REMOVAL AMM TASK 76-11-05-400-801-A/400 CONTROL STAND MASK - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223OZ Control pedestal 223 223NZ Control pedestal 223 223SZ Control Pedestal 223 223RZ Control Pedestal D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To help with the inspection of the thrust lever Flashlight 1 available resolver Commercially To help with the inspection of the thrust lever Inspection mirror 1 available resolver F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 76-12-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: • POWERPLANT - START 1/2 • LIGHTS - PEDESTAL PANEL (2) Remove access panels 223SZ and 223RZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (3) Remove the control stand mask ( AMM TASK 76-11-05-000-801-A/400). (4) Remove the aileron-disconnect indication light from panel 223NZ, but do not disconnect the electrical connector ( AMM TASK 76-11-01-000-801-A/400). (5) NOTE: To do the step that follows, loosen the aileron-disconnect indication-light harness through access panel 223RZ. Move access panel 223NZ to the right side of the control pedestal ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (6) Remove the speed-brake command lever (AMM TASK 27-63-03-000-801-A/400). (7) Remove the elevator-disconnect indication light from panel 223OZ, but do not disconnect the electrical connector ( AMM TASK 76-11-01-000-801-A/400). (8) NOTE: To do the step that follows, loosen the elevator-disconnect indication-light harness through access panel 223SZ. Move access panel 223OZ to the left side of the control pedestal ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). J. Visual Inspection on Resolver Attachments to the Thrust Levers (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a general visual inspection on the resolver for general condition, damage failure, and security. Examine these components: NOTE: To do the inspection, use the flashlight and inspection mirror as necessary. (a) The resolver electrical harnesses for signs of wear, chafing, and damage. (b) The lockwire that attaches the shaft of the resolver to the flexible joint for correct installation and security. (c) The two setscrews for presence of sealant on their top. (d) The attachment screws for correct installation and security. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install access panel 223OZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 76-12-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Install the elevator-disconnect indication light to panel 223OZ ( AMM TASK 76-11-01-400-801-A/400). (3) Install the speed-brake command lever (AMM TASK 27-63-03-400-801-A/400). (4) Install access panel 223NZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (5) Install the aileron-disconnect indication light to panel 223NZ ( AMM TASK 76-11-01-400-801-A/400). (6) Install the control stand mask ( AMM TASK 76-11-05-400-801-A/400). (7) Install access panels 223SZ and 223RZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (8) On the circuit breaker panel, close these circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tags from them: • POWERPLANT - START 1/2 • LIGHTS - PEDESTAL PANEL EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 76-12-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
